name: Universally Loved (itch)
description:
UNIVERSALLY LOVED

-Alpha Release-

Full Version on Steam


ALPHA RELEASE (FULL VERSION ON STEAM)

Convince beings beyond your understanding to love, respect and understand you... Rather than mock, maim, and kill you.

HOW TO PLAY:

Read, make choices, accept consequences. Space or enter to advance dialogue, click to choose your dialogue.

Follow @MeantGames
